Literature.Title: Ruminococcin A, a new lantibiotic produced by a Ruminococcus gnavus strain isolated from human feces.
Literature.Author: Dabard J, Bridonneau C, Phillipe C, Anglade P, Molle D, Nardi M, Ladiré M, Girardin H, Marcille F, Gomez A, Fons M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacteroides putredenis ATCC 29800(no activity data),Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron ATCC 29148(no activity data),Bacteroides vulgatus ATCC 8482(MIC=600µg/ml),Bacteroides fragilis ATCC 25285(no activity data),Bifidobacterium adolescentis ATCC 15703(MIC=150µg/ml),Bifidobacterium breve ATCC 15700(MIC=300µg/ml),Bifidobacterium catenulatum ATCC 27539(MIC=150µg/ml),Bifidobacterium longum ATCC 15707(MIC=75µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis CIP 76.117(no activity data),Faecalicatena contorta ATCC 25540(MIC=32.5µg/ml),Blautia obeum ATCC 29174(MIC=32.5µg/ml),Ruminococcus torques ATCC 27756(MIC=300µg/ml),Ruminococcus gnavus ATCC 29149(MIC=75µg/ml),Clostridium nexile ATCC 27757(MIC=150µg/ml),Clostridium oroticum ATCC 13619(MIC=600µg/ml),Clostridium perfringens(MIC=75µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile ATCC 43598(MIC=150µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile ATCC 43255(MIC=150µg/ml),Clostridium botulinum CIP 38(MIC=75µg/ml),Paeniclostridium sordellii VPI 9048(MIC=150µg/ml),Paraclostridium bifermentans NCTC 506(MIC=75µg/ml),Clostridium septicum ATCC 12464(MIC=150µg/ml),Clostridium sporogenes ATCC 19404(MIC=300µg/ml),Bacillus cereus(MIC=75-150µg/ml)
